weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white, and good for snowballs! What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm made of frozen water.
☃️ You can build with me.
⛷️ You need me to go skiing.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I come out during the day.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Plants love to feel me.

weather.question: I come from clouds, and I can make you wet. Sometimes I pour down really hard. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I appear.
💧 Plants need me to survive.
👟 Puddles form when I'm around.

weather.question: I blow through the trees, rustling the leaves. Sometimes I'm gentle, sometimes I'm strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make things move.
🪁 You can fly a kite when I am blowing.
🌬️ I can be a breeze or a gust.

weather.question: I am a white fluffy thing in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain, sometimes I bring sunshine. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like a sheep in the sky.
🌧️ I can block the sun.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🌩️ I am associated with storms.
⚡I follow a flash of light.
👂 You can hear me from far away.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc that appears after a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
☀️ You can sometimes see me when rain and sun happen at the same time.
🍀 It is said that there is gold at my end.

weather.question: I am frozen rain, bigger than raindrops. Sometimes I can damage cars and roofs. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of ice.
☔ I fall from the sky during storms.
🤕 People run for cover when I start to fall.

weather.question: I am a storm with a swirling center and very strong winds. I form over warm ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a very strong wind.
🌊 I can cause flooding.
🏠 People evacuate before I hit.

weather.question: I am a long period with little or no rain. Plants and animals struggle when I come to visit. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 The ground is very dry when I am here
🏜️ Water becomes scarce
🔥 I can lead to wildfires

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am not a fish.
🏡 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants and algae.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. People are sometimes scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I live in the ocean.
🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🏊 I am a predator.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change color.
🪨 I like to hide in rocks.
💪 Each arm has suckers

ocean.question: I am a mammal that lives in the ocean and makes clicking sounds. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am very intelligent.
🗣️ I use echolocation.
🌊 I like to play in the waves.

ocean.question: I am very tiny and float in the ocean. Many animals eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔬 You need a microscope to see me well.
🌿 I am like a plant, but in the ocean.
🐟 Small fish eat me

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am often small and brightly colored.
🧱 I live near a structure made of tiny animals.
🌈 I can be orange, blue, yellow, or all 3!

ocean.question: I am a large animal that lives in the ocean, but I'm not a fish. I have a blowhole on my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
💨 I breathe air.
🎶 I can sing songs!

ocean.question: I am a sea creature with five arms that can regrow if they break off. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have radial symmetry.
🖐️ You can count my arms with one hand.
✨ I am shaped like a star.

ocean.question: I am a current in the Atlantic Ocean that brings warm water up from the equator. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I affect the weather in Europe.
🌡️ I help keep places warm.
🌊 I am a river inside the ocean

ocean.question: I am a deep, dark place in the ocean, much deeper than most other areas. No sunlight reaches me. What am I called?

hints.text: 🌑 Many strange creatures live here.
🗻 I am deeper than Mount Everest is tall.
🔦 Animals must make their own light here
